title: Odyssey missions are bugged
body:
The missions for Odyssey are either:
a) not updating
b) completely vanishing
c) updating repeatedly over and over with the same result

Is there something up with the server?

replies.body: Correct and the bug is being worked on at this time!

> [{quoted}](name=Riñey,realm=NA,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=BJXHiO1u,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-09-13T02:11:37.195+0000)
>
> Correct and the bug is being worked on at this time!

is if fixed yet as the yellow ! icon is gone but my missions are still copletely gone even the completed ones i just sent a ticket through to support
